name: Additional Payments
query:
SELECT
    patient_id AS "Patient ID:Data:120",
    patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:150",
    age AS "Age:Int:50",
    reason AS "Reason for Additional Payment:Data:150",
    payment_amount AS "Additional Payment Amount:Currency:100",
    date AS "Additional Payment Date:Date:120"
FROM
    tabAdditional Payments
ORDER BY
    date DESC;
